description: HVPAConfigurationHPA contains HPA related configuration for the HVPA of the Gardener Extension API server

maxReplicas.description: MaxReplicas is the maximum number of replicas. Defaults to 4.

minReplicas.description: MinReplicas is the minimum number of replicas. Defaults to 1.

targetAverageUtilizationCpu.description: TargetAverageUtilizationCpu is the average CPU utilization targeted by the HPA component of the HVPA Defaults to: 80

targetAverageUtilizationMemory.description: TargetAverageUtilizationMemory is the average memory utilization targeted by the HPA component of the HVPA Defaults to: 80
